categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Jay Benedict (April 11, 1951[source?] – April 4, 2020) was an American-born actor who spent most of his life and career in the United Kingdom. He passed away from complications arising from COVID-19 in 2020.
He played Luke Skywalker's friend Deak in the 1977 film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, though Benedict's performance and the Tosche Station scene as a whole were cut from the final film.
